name: Bring-up
description: MUX-level bring-up calibration (resonator spectroscopy). Runs once per MUX for initial characterization.

name: Simple Calibration
description: Basic calibration for learning and simple tasks. Supports MUX-based and qubit-based targeting with customizable tasks and execution modes.

name: 1Q Calibration
description: 1-qubit calibration using step-based pipeline. Supports check-only or full calibration with fine-tune.

name: Full Calibration
description: Complete calibration using step-based pipeline: 1Q Check -> 1Q Fine-tune -> Filter -> CR Schedule (forward/reverse) -> 2Q.

name: 2Q Calibration
description: Two-qubit calibration from candidate qubits. Auto-generates optimal CR schedule with explicit checkerboard direction (forward/reverse). Default: forward.

name: 2Q Scheduled Calibration
description: Two-qubit calibration with user-defined schedule. Specify qubit pairs and parallel groups directly.

name: Parallel Retry Calibration
description: Parallel execution with @task + submit(). Demonstrates retry logic with frequency offset.

name: Check Skew
description: System-level skew measurement and calibration across MUX channels.

name: Fake Backend Calibration
description: Calibration with backend switching. Use backend_name='fake' for testing, 'qubex' for production. Customize tasks list for provenance testing.

name: 1Q Gate Coherence Limit
description: Calculate theoretical fidelity limit of 1Q gates from T1, T2 coherence times and DRAG half-pi pulse duration.
